stripe.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a line of colour, especially one of several lines of colour all close together
stripe.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a shirt with black and white stripes
stripe.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a narrow piece of material worn on the arm of a uniform as a sign of rank
stripe.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: a line of colour, especially one of several lines of colour all close together
the red and white stripes on the US flag
a coloured line or thin mark, especially one that is not straight or has been made accidentally
His hair was black with streaks of grey.
He saw the red streaks of sunrise in the sky.
a thick line of colour that is different from the areas around it
The fish has a black band on its fin.
